pages.text: The voidberry is a rather unusual item. It has the ability to launch whoever ate it forward, it glows purple, and it has void repelling qualities!

To obtain voidberries, you must find Voidberry Vines on the underside of End Islands. Once there, right-clicking will harvest some of the berries, depending on how many were on it. I should warn you, though, touching these vines will blind you and slow you down!

Now that you have Voidberries, you can make some cool stuff with them, such as $(l:televator)Televators$(/l), $(l:televator)Televators$(/l), $(l:gravity_duper)Gravity Dupers$(/l), $(l:ore_necklaces)Ore Necklaces$(/l) and Void Repellent and Totem Popper potions!

If you want to plant more Voidberries, all you have to do is throw some voidberry into the void in the end! If the conditions are right, the Voidberry will eventually crack on impact with the void, unleashing its power and creating more Voidberry Vines!
